basic.description: This course addresses research-based literacy strategies and content essential for differentiating reading instruction across content areas, using assessments to inform instruction, and implementing tiers of intervention.
basic.subject: EDE
basic.title: Differentiating Reading and Content Area Literacy Instruction

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: LAE 4314, RED 4310 and TSL 4080. Corequisite: RED 4510.
